A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's a nice addition to my collection\, with twists\, humor\, new characters\, and very cool scenes. I am not sure the reason some fans didn't like it. They said TFA didn't take any risks and basically a remake of new hope\, and now they say TLJ took to much risks by not doing same things. I think we are the only fandom that is ungrateful and looking to trash the new movies no matter how original or non original the movies.
